topic.title: Get access to Qodana Cloud
topic.p: You can get access to %product_cloud% via an invitation link. After you click the invitation link, the %product_cloud% homepage will open. Here, you can overview reports of publicly available and demo projects.

list.li: You can click the Log in button in the upper-right corner of the page to create a %product_cloud% account on the Log inpage.
As a non-registered user, you can explore demo projects that were analyzed by %product%. For more information about reports, see the Overview reports section.

topic.p: On the Log in page, you can create a JetBrains account. Once you complete this step, choose the account type, either commercial or personal.

If you choose a commercial type of account, you will be able to create a business account or join the existing account of your company. If you plan to use %product_cloud% for personal purposes only, choose the personal account type.
For more information about organizations in %product_cloud%, see the Organizations section.

note.p: Using a personal account, you will not be able to bind your personal account to a company or perform any actions on behalf of your company. Personal accounts are always associated with the My organization company, which cannot be changed.

topic.p: Use the Log in button to log into %product_cloud%.
Depending on your account type, a specific role will be assigned to your account. For more details, see the User roles section.
